product_name: Continental Trail King Protection 29er Folding Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: The Continental Trail King Protection 29er Folding Tire delivers solid handling and control for your big-wheeled trail rides. It features reinforced sidewalls for extra protection against punctures.
short_description: The Continental Trail King Protection 29er Folding Tire delivers solid handling and control for your big-wheeled trail rides. It features reinforced sidewalls for extra protection against punctures.
